garden/content/posts/lang.terraform.quic.title: Terraform Quick Start
garden/content/posts/lang.terraform.quic.content:
In the introduction to [Terraform](posts/lang.terraform) we got a general overview

## Getting Started

Now 

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
terraform destroy
```
